definitions.definition: used to say that something can only happen or be true in a particular situation

examples.text: You won't get paid for time off unless you have a doctor's note.
I won't tell them—not unless you say I can.
Unless I'm mistaken, she was back at work yesterday.
He hasn't got any hobbies—unless you call watching TV a hobby.

definitions.definition: used to give the only situation in which something will not happen or be true

examples.text: I sleep with the window open unless it's really cold.
Unless something unexpected happens, I'll see you tomorrow.
Have a cup of tea—unless you'd prefer a cold drink?

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from on or in (assimilated through lack of stress to un-) + less.
